p: Pretreatment with silymarin (50 mg/kg), used as positive control, significantly decreased the elevated levels of ALT, AST, ALP, LDH, γGT, total cholesterol, triglycerides, LDL urea and creatinine and increased of HDL level as compared to CCl 4 group. Its effect was comparable in reducing of liver and kidney damage induced by CCl 4 with that observed for the highest dose of MpEO (40 mg/kg).
